ComicInfo.Summary:
How badly do you want to be a superhuman? Finally, Joshua will have to answer this. Mediocrity is the question and FX7 is the answer. And throwing away all his life away for just one chance to become something beyond human will prove to be a tricky and dangerous game that will lead Joshua to a heroic dream or to infinite madness.
*Notes:* The third cover is a homage of the cover of The X-Men #100.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-10-06 22:25:53. [CVDB141243]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andres Mossa, Greg Waller, Juan Jose Ryp
ComicInfo.Characters: Carrick Masterson, Jack Marsh, Josh Carver, The Operator
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State
